data.title: Heat X-Treme
data.meta_description: The Track Heat line has been the most iconic in the Track brand. Filling the shoes of greatness is never an easy task, but at Track, we feel we knocked this one out of the park. The new Heat X-Treme takes mid-performance to a whole new level with unimaginable traction in oil. It’s time to go X-treme!
data.text:
Track Heat X-Treme - The Track Heat line has been the most iconic in the Track brand. Filling the shoes of greatness is never an easy task, but at Track, we feel we knocked this one out of the park. The new Heat X-Treme takes mid-performance to a whole new level with unimaginable traction in oil. It’s time to go X-treme!

MODIFIED TRI-CORE

The Modified Tri-Core is a throw back to the core design found in the original Heat. We’ve matched the RG perfectly to the original while lowering the flare potential slightly to match up better with today’s stronger covers.

QR-5 SOLID COVER

We designed the QR-5 Solid Cover specifically with this brand new Heat in mind. This cover creates maximum traction in the mid-lane, giving every player the control & predictability they desire. This ball will be great on medium to heavy oil lane conditions.

Specifications

Color Red / Orange / Black Core Modified Tri-Core Core Type Symmetrical Coverstock QR-5 Solid Finish 500 / 2000 Abralon® Lane Condition Medium To Heavy Oil Weights 16-12 Pounds

Core Numbers

Weight RG DIFF 16 lb 2.510 0.033 15 lb 2.500 0.038 14 lb 2.490 0.045 13 lb 2.530 0.055 12 lb 2.600 0.039

Stay Informed
